character_schedule.morning: Rethink stabilization mechanism to improve system yield; sketch new designs.
character_schedule.afternoon: Review preliminary results; discuss data filtering algorithm and efficiency metrics.
character_schedule.evening: Have a nervous breakdown over budget and new president.

user_schedule.morning: Revises interview protocol based on yesterday’s meeting; drafts new open-ended questions focusing on class identity.
user_schedule.afternoon: Goes back to the field site to conduct more interviews; overhears a group of locals discussing displacement policies. Joins the conversation briefly.
user_schedule.evening: Reflects on the day’s emotional toll and writes a short journal entry about researcher reflexivity.

relationship: Two people have just met and are still unfamiliar with each other. Their conversations are mostly polite and superficial, limited to everyday topics like work, studies, or the weather. At this stage, both sides are cautious and have yet to reveal their true selves.
